name: Suffers
description:
Story: The sun has vanished and a long darkness came over earth and humanity. You are one of the last people left in a world of mistrust, death and darkness that is covered in the snow of never ending blizzards. What is left from humanity lives in settlements, with house far away from each other. Can you even trust your closest neighbour, your friends or family? Everyone would become a murder to save their own life in this dark world.

Note: This is an atmospheric adventure game, first you walk around your settlement, find hidden notes that unravel the fates of the people who used to live there.

Controls: WASD to move,   E to interact,  F to close,   ESC to open Menu.

System requirements: 2GB RAM, Dual Core CPU,  128MB VRAM, 135MB free HDD space

Please note: If you have troubles interacting with objects, try again from small distance.
